mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANUMBER), 0) + 1 AS next_id FROM ARTICLE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE (ANUMBER, CATEGRY, LOCATNS, ARTITLE, USERID, CONTENT, EWRITER) VALUES (#{anumber}, #{categry}, #{locatns}, #{artitle}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{ewriter})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKECNT WHERE ANUMBER=#{anumber} and USERID=#{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET LOCATNS=#{locatns}, ARTITLE=#{artitle}, CONTENT=#{content}, EWRITER=#{userid}, EDTDATE=NOW() WHERE ANUMBER=#{anumber}
